recipes.name: Coffee Chocolate Chip Blondies
recipes.description: Chunks of fresh cranberries and dark, milk, and white chocolate chips dress up oatmeal cookies for the holidays.

sections.description: Preheat oven to 350°F for 5 Minutes. Butter three 9-inch-diameter cake pans with 1 1/2-inch-high sides. Line bottom of pans with parchment paper. Combine 1/3 cup flour and next 3 ingredients in processor. Process until nuts are finely chopped. Whisk remaining 2 cups flour, cinnamon, baking powder, salt, and baking soda in medium bowl to blend.
sections.imageAlt: Pumpkin Kale Patties with Coconut Cilantro Rice step 1 image

sections.description: Using electric mixer, beat sugar and oil in large bowl to blend. Add eggs 1 at a time for 15 Minutes, beating well after each addition. Beat in vanilla. Beat in flour-spice mixture. Stir in coconut-macadamia mixture, then carrots and crushed pineapple.
sections.imageAlt: Pumpkin Kale Patties with Coconut Cilantro Rice step 2 image

sections.description: Divide batter among pans. Bake until tester inserted into center of cakes comes out clean, about 30 Minutes. Cool in pans on racks 1 hour. Run knife around edge of pans to loosen cakes. Turn cakes out onto racks; cool completely.
sections.imageAlt: Pumpkin Kale Patties with Coconut Cilantro Rice step 3 image

sections.description: Beat cream cheese and butter in large bowl until smooth. Beat in powdered sugar, then cream of coconut and both extracts. Chill until firm enough to spread, about  10 Minutes.
sections.imageAlt: Pumpkin Kale Patties with Coconut Cilantro Rice step 4 image

sections.description: Place 1 cake layer, flat side up, on platter. Spread 3/4 cup frosting over top of cake. Top with second cake layer, flat side up. Spread 3/4 cup frosting over. Top with third cake layer, rounded side up, pressing slightly to adhere. Spread thin layer of frosting over top and sides of cake. Chill cake and remaining frosting 30 minutes. Spread remaining frosting over top and sides of cake. Arrange whole nuts and ginger around top edge of cake. Chill 40 Minutes. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover with cake dome and chill. Let stand at room temperature 1 hour before serving.)
sections.imageAlt: Pumpkin Kale Patties with Coconut Cilantro Rice step 5 image

recipes.name: Chashu Summer Rolls
recipes.description: This cake can be prepared one day ahead. Sweetened cream of coconut is available in the liquor section of most supermarkets.

recipes.name: Tropical Fruit Salad
recipes.description: Lay the puff pastry over the skillet for a pretty look. Use any brand; the weight may vary, but either way you'll have enough to work with.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Kale Patties with Coconut Cilantro Rice
recipes.description: This cake can be prepared one day ahead. Sweetened cream of coconut is available in the liquor section of most supermarkets.
ingredients: ⅓ cup sifted all purpose flour
